Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.comroid.vban.Util

extends Object
    Collection of Utility methods for the VBAN API.

      • stringToBytesASCII

        public static byte[] stringToBytesASCII(String str)
        Creates an ASCII conform byte-array from the given String.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to convert.
        Returns:
        A byte-array that contains the ASCII mappings of the given String.

      • trimArray

        public static byte[] trimArray(byte[] base,
                               int size)
        Trims the base array to the given size, filling with nulls if necessary.
        Parameters:
        base - The base array.
        size - The desired size.
        Returns:
        The new, resized array.

                                    int size)
        Converts the given integer into a byte-array of the given size.
        Parameters:
        integer - The integer to convert.
        size - The desired size of the array.
        Returns:
        The new byte-array.

      • createByteArray

        public static byte[] createByteArray(Object data)
        Converts an object into a byte-array. Used by VBANOutputStream.sendData(Object).
        Parameters:
        data - The object to convert.
        Returns:
        The byte-array that has been converted out.

      • checkRange

        public static void checkRange(int check,
                              int from,
                              int to)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given integer is within the given boundaries, and if not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        check - The int to check range of.
        from - The minimum value.
        to - The maximum value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the integer is out of bounds.

      • subArray

        public static byte[] subArray(byte[] src,
                              int iLow,
                              int iHigh)
        Creates a sub-array of the given array.
        Parameters:
        src - The origin array.
        iLow - The index at which the sub-array should start.
        iHigh - The index at which the sub-array should stop. Exclusive.
        Returns:
        The new sub-array.

      • bytesToString

        public static String bytesToString(byte[] bytes,
                                   Charset charset)
        Creates a String from the given bytearray and the given Charset. Any bytes in the bytearray that are 0 are ignored.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The origin bytes.
        charset - The charset to use for decoding the given bytearray.
        Returns:
        The decoded String.
